title: Astounding Science Fiction v44n3
creator: Street and Smith Publications
description: The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. Astounding Science Fiction , Volume 44 Number 3, November of 1949. Published by Street & Smith Publications,Â  Inc., New York, NY. 164 pages. Cover art by Hubert Rogers. Edited by John W. Campbell, Jr. Featuring essays by John W. Campbell, Jr. as The Editor and R. S. Richardson. Includes the following works of fiction: ...And Now You Don't (Part 1 of 3), Foundation Original Series part 8 of 8), a serial by Isaac Asimov. Over the Top, shortstory by Lester del Rey. Gulf (Part 1 of 2), serial by Robert A. Heinlein. Final Command, shortstory by A. E. van Vogt. What Dead Men Tell, a novelette by Theodore Sturgeon. Finished, a Viagens Interplanetarias shortstory by L. Sprague de Camp
